name: PlayStation 5
description: Experience the next generation of gaming with the PlayStation 5. Stunning graphics, fast load times, and an immersive gaming experience.

name: Xbox Series X
description: Discover the power of the Xbox Series X. Play your favorite games in 4K resolution with lightning-fast load times.

name: Nintendo Switch
description: Enjoy the flexibility of gaming on the go with the Nintendo Switch. Play in handheld mode or dock it for a traditional console experience.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in high-quality audio with the Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones. Noise-canceling technology for a distraction-free experience.

name: Apple Watch Series 6
description: Stay connected and track your health with the Apple Watch Series 6. Featuring a stunning always-on display and advanced health monitoring.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4
description: Elevate your fitness journey with the Samsung Galaxy Watch 4. Track your workouts, monitor your health, and stay connected on the go.

name: Xbox Elite Series 2 Controller
description: Take your gaming to the next level with the Xbox Elite Series 2 Controller. Customizable features and precision control for a competitive edge.

name: Logitech MX Master 3
description: Boost your productivity with the Logitech MX Master 3. Advanced features and ergonomic design for a seamless workflow.

name: Generic Notebook
description: A versatile and powerful notebook for everyday use. Features a high-speed SSD for quick data access and a sleek silver design.

name: Earpods Pro
description: Immerse yourself in superior sound quality with the Earpods Pro. Wireless design for ultimate convenience and comfort.

name: Virtual Reality Experience Kit
description: Step into the world of virtual reality with this immersive VR kit. Includes built-in speakers for a complete sensory experience.

name: NextGen Gaming Console
description: Unleash the power of the next generation with this high-performance gaming console. Featuring a massive SSD for lightning-fast load times.

name: Logitech Wireless Mouse
description: Enhance your productivity with the Logitech Wireless Mouse. Comfortable design and reliable wireless connectivity for seamless use.

name: Airmax True Wireless Earbuds
description: Experience true wireless freedom with the Airmax TWS Earbuds. High-quality audio and comfortable fit for all-day use.

name: Pro Gaming Handle
description: Dominate the gaming arena with the Pro Gaming Handle. Ergonomic design and customizable buttons for a competitive edge.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: Upgrade your gaming setup with the Mechanical Gaming Keyboard. Responsive switches and customizable RGB lighting for an immersive experience.

name: Pro Game Controller
description: Take control of your gaming experience with the Pro Game Controller. Precision and comfort for long gaming sessions.

name: Immersive VR Gaming Kit
description: Dive into a new dimension of gaming with the Immersive VR Gaming Kit. Includes VR headset and motion controllers for a lifelike experience.

name: DragonChip Processor
description: Unleash the power of the dragon with the DragonChip Processor. High-performance computing for demanding tasks and gaming.

name: UltraWide Gaming Monitor
description: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals with the UltraWide Gaming Monitor. High refresh rate and crisp resolution for a competitive edge.

name: TechSmart Watch
description: Stay connected and track your fitness with the TechSmart Watch. Elegant design and smart features for a modern lifestyle.
